ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides the Minecraft Building Assistance Game (MBAG) environment for studying complex assistance games. It includes the implementation of AssistanceZero for training AI assistants and allows integration with Minecraft via Project Malmo. The repository also provides a house dataset for training and evaluation, enabling researchers to develop and test AI agents capable of assisting human players in building tasks within Minecraft.
